meaningMnemonic: A cult <radical>leader</radical> has a great <radical>idea</radical> to recruit a <kanji>hundred million</kanji> new members. Since he’s the guy with all the ideas, he is the leader of the cult. His idea is to give every new member a free puppy. He’ll have a hundred million new recruits in no time.
readingMnemonic: The cult leader has his headquarters in <reading>Ok</reading>lahoma (おく). Are there a <kanji>hundred million</kanji> people in Oklahoma? No, probably not. But hey, this leader is shooting for the stars. First Oklahoma, then the universe!
